rows.label: bf09160100_0010
rows.name: Dad!

rows.label: bf09160100_0020
rows.name: Luxuria too?!

rows.label: bf09160100_0030
rows.name:
Why?!
Saika!

rows.label: bf09160100_0040
rows.name: It's no use, my words can't reach him anymore.

rows.label: bf09160100_0050
rows.name:
Dammitall...
What the hell is that Pope thinking?

rows.label: bf09160100_0060
rows.name:
At this rate, he'll destroy Alst
before Metsu does!

rows.label: bf09160100_0070
rows.name: Desperation.

rows.label: bf09160100_0080
rows.name: What d'ya mean?

rows.label: bf09160100_0090
rows.name: Desperation at not getting the Holy Grail.

rows.label: bf09160100_0100
rows.name: That man...

rows.label: bf09160100_0110
rows.name:
What's his plan?
Why would he be so intent on obtaining the Holy Grail?

rows.label: bf09160100_0120
rows.name:
We've...we've gotta do something 
to stop the Divine Beasts fighting.

rows.label: bf09160100_0130
rows.name:
That's easy to say, but what can we do
about it when they're all the way out there?

rows.label: bf09160100_0140
rows.name: ...Got it! The glowing pillars!

rows.label: bf09160100_0150
rows.name:
Just then, when one of the pillars got wrecked,
Marveni's power got weaker for a moment!

rows.label: bf09160100_0160
rows.name:
So if we smash the pillars, he'll
lose control over the Divine Beasts...?

rows.label: bf09160100_0170
rows.name:
It's worth a shot!
Okay. Hikari?

rows.label: bf09160100_0180
rows.name: And we only want to hit the pillars?

rows.label: bf09160100_0190
rows.name: Yeah.

rows.label: bf09160100_0200
rows.name:
It's moving far too much,
I can't get a clear shot...

rows.label: bf09160100_0210
rows.name: This isn't going to work.

rows.label: bf09160100_0220
rows.name: Oh man...

rows.label: bf09160100_0230
rows.name: (I know - Hikari-chan!)

rows.label: bf09160100_0240
rows.name: What?

rows.label: bf09160100_0250
rows.name:
If we can get a little closer, we might
be able to do something.

rows.label: bf09160100_0260
rows.name: Is that true, Homura?

rows.label: bf09160100_0270
rows.name:
Probably!
Think back, do you remember our fight against Shin?

rows.label: bf09160100_0280
rows.name: By rewriting the physical laws of the surroundings...

rows.label: bf09160100_0290
rows.name: we were able to match Shin's speed.

rows.label: bf09160100_0300
rows.name:
If we rewrote them in the same way,
in the midst of battle between those two...

rows.label: bf09160100_0310
rows.name:
From our point of view, it'll be like
they've frozen in place, huh...? Okay...

rows.label: bf09160100_0320
rows.name: But how do we get there?

rows.label: bf09160100_0330
rows.name: Ha! Tora have good suggestion!

rows.label: bf09160100_0340
rows.name: Hana!

rows.label: bf09160100_0350
rows.name:
Think you could grab Hikari-chan and
bro and carry up there?

rows.label: bf09160100_0360
rows.name: Sure thing! I can handle carrying those two, no problem!

rows.label: bf09160100_0370
rows.name: Ta-daa!

rows.label: bf09160100_0380
rows.name:
Okay, let's do it!
Everyone else after Shin!

rows.label: bf09160100_0390
rows.name: Hang on!

rows.label: bf09160100_0400
rows.name: We don't have time to argue here.

rows.label: bf09160100_0410
rows.name:
Don't worry.
We're going to make this work. Right?

rows.label: bf09160100_0420
rows.name: Right!

rows.label: bf09160100_0430
rows.name:
Boss! Please remember,
Hana booster time limited!

rows.label: bf09160100_0440
rows.name:
Understood!
We'll get as close as we can!
